        Scale by factor with scale's center
        Parameters:
        factor - scaling factor (1.0f does nothing => 100% scale)
        cex - scaling center X coordinate
        cey - scaling center Y coordinate

         java.lang.Float cex,

        Scale by factor with scale's center
        Parameters:
        factorx - scaling X factor (1.0f does nothing => 100% scale)
        factory - scaling Y factor (1.0f does nothing => 100% scale)
        cex - scaling center X coordinate
        cey - scaling center Y coordinate
